pages.text: The Sigil of Boundless Nature bridges the gap between Blood Magic and Botania, transforming Life Essence into mana. This sigil functions as a mana tablet for Botania tools, but instead of drawing from mana pools, it converts LP directly into mana.

Shift-right-click to toggle the sigil on or off. When active, it will automatically convert LP into mana once per second.$(br2)$(blood)LP Cost:$() 1 LP per second$(br)$(animus)Mana Storage:$() 2500 mana

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: While active, the sigil consumes 1 LP every second (20 ticks) and converts it into mana based on the configured conversion rate (default: 2 mana per LP).$(br2)The sigil will only consume LP when there's room in its mana buffer. Once full at 2500 mana, it stops consuming LP until mana is used.

pages.title: Mana Usage
pages.text: The Sigil of Boundless Nature implements Botania's ManaItem interface, making it compatible with all mana-using tools and equipment.$(br2)Keep the sigil in your inventory alongside Botania tools like the Mana Blaster, Mana Mirror, or any mana-powered equipment. They will draw mana from the sigil just like they would from a Mana Tablet.

pages.title: LP vs Mana Pools
pages.text: Unlike regular Mana Tablets, this sigil $(blood)cannot$() receive mana from mana pools or spreaders; it's exclusively LP-powered. However, it $(animus)can$() provide mana to both mana pools and other items/tools.$(br2)This makes it perfect for hybrid practitioners who want to bridge LP and mana systems, whether filling pools or powering tools.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: The conversion rate is configurable in the Animus config file:$(br2)$(will)LPtoManaConversionRate:$() Controls how much mana is gained per LP consumed (default: 2 mana per LP)$(br2)$(will)Requires:$() Botania must be installed for this sigil to function.
